title: Metrics section
description: Added new tab 'Metrics', Displays the Weekly usage stats and  Aggregate stats

title: Added Service Down Banner support
description: When the tech team brings the service for maintenance, the users will now see a service down banner, instead of an un-responsive application

title: Node Supported integrated in frontend
description: Now, we can update node values of a slide, search by node values and  insert a specific node into currently open slide deck.

title: Various UI improvements
description:
1. User can update the node values in the slide details,
2. User can search keyword by node
